website_summaries.verdict: Although the brushes could be better, this travel kit is a good choice for keeping shoes looking their best while on the go.
pros: Packed with items that are smaller than average, which makes them ideal for travel
Owners rave about the slender travel case that is well-made and fits nicely into larger bags
Company offers a money-back satisfaction guarantee
cons: The downside of the small brushes is that they can be awkward to use on some types of shoes

customer_reviews.title: Exceed my expectation!
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with a very elegant leather design container. You could just easily store in your car and it doesn't cost any room at all. I use this Kit polish and it does a great job on my ankle boots. You just apply it with a sponge and the brush it vigorously with a Kit shoe brush. I was amazing how this kit shoe wax cover up the scuffs on my shoes and give my shoes a total new look. Definitely recommend this kit to anybody is looking for a great quality of shoe polish kit.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: It can be easily stored in any place since it Compact size
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with a decent leather container. It can be easily stored in any place since it Compact size. I have used this kit to clean and polish my boots and it works well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ting Dai

customer_reviews.title: The perfect travel kit!
customer_reviews.text: My husband didn't realize this was a small kit, but I can't blame the seller for that. But just pay attention that the brushes are very small, but PERFECT for a travel kit! (Which is what it was designed for!) :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bates

customer_reviews.title: This 12pc shoes polish kit came very nicely picked. It came with few different colors
customer_reviews.text: This 12pc shoes polish kit came very nicely picked. It came with few different colors,it was very nice. I used this polish kit to polish my shoes and my leather bags, they come out great, I will buy another.
customer_reviews.author: yuki

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and useful shoe care kit! Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe care kit come with a leather- like case, very pretty! Small but has everything inside. My leather UGG had so many scratches. I brushed with little amount of black polish for the entire body of the shoe, about 2-3 minutes,then used the sponge wipe it. Very easy and quick, Now my UGG looks like brand new!!
customer_reviews.author: Joie

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a small fun gift to 2 nephews who just entered the "executive world". They can use it home or for travel. Nice case and the accessories are the perfect size (nobody uses the big shine kits anymore). Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Cathie

customer_reviews.title: I am a large man and everything felt tiny. ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a large man and everything felt tiny. The products worked well but they are smaller than I expected. Also, they've added a few items since my purchase so i don't know if my review is relevant anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Cooper

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is confused again. Asked me how this item fit. Works great nice little kit, the included polish is very small and may not be what you expect.
customer_reviews.author: topher

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I bought this shoe care kit for my boyfriend. He travels a lot and needs to take care his leather shoes during business trip. The product has all necessary tools to make shoes shinning. Very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Summerfield

customer_reviews.title: Good for carry-on/travel
customer_reviews.text: it is very small. Everything is miniature in the small box. Good for carry-on/travel.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kazi

customer_reviews.title: This kit is the perfect accessory for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This kit is the perfect accessory for traveling! It comes with everything you would need to keep up that perfect shine . It will also make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Maria

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this one
customer_reviews.text: Many of the products in the kit are not identified for the purpose of use. I purchased to use as a travel kit but wouldn't buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Star
customer_reviews.text: Perfect production,make my shoes super shining again!Recommend to all my friends

customer_reviews.title: The quality is much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: A valuable set; covers all I need for leather shoe care, and takes care both my light-colored and dark-colored shoes. The quality is much better than I expected, and the space design is very smart. I would recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. The cans and tubes are much smaller than they seem. They are good quality and the seller provides great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect polish kit for black leather shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect polish kit for black leather shoes. Also it's great if just need to place a shine on any color leather shoes. I used this before a gala and it had my favorite pair of Italian leather shoes looking like new.
customer_reviews.author: Dartanyon

customer_reviews.title: Good product, small size
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought. Good for learning techniques with and figuring out what everything does hand on. Would make a nice gift, however not recommended for someone serious about caring for their shoes long term.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, compact suze!

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe Shine Kit
customer_reviews.text: Needed a compact shoe shine kit for the house. Worked perfectly. Had all the tools I needed to jazz up some of my dress shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a pretty cool set. Obviously made in China. Comes in a nice, interesting, round storage box and has both paste and cream polish. For the price its a nice kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Olson

customer_reviews.title: Small travel size shoe care
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for travel. The only thing that I would change is the quality of the shoe polish colors. But over all I would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Marlyn Urbanski

customer_reviews.title: The best shoe kit I have had!!!
customer_reviews.text: What an incredibly well done Kit!!! For the price way more then I expected. Everything organized and fits perfectly into nice case. Great Job!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Travel worthy
customer_reviews.text: Good collection of items for travel. The items were not labeled in English...

customer_reviews.text: The applicator brush is oddly shaped so it causes a bit of difficulty and waste when putting on the polish.

customer_reviews.title: decent find, not as fgood as an old kiwi ...
customer_reviews.text: decent find,not as fgood as an old kiwi tin i had from years ago that seems to have gone on walkabout but it will do.

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit had everything I needed
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit had everything I needed. As a novice entering the work force trying to care of my shoes was a way to avoid constantly buying new ones. this definitely helps.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Very good and useful tool. My kit arrived without nail clippers and 1 of the brushes was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Entrena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ok in afix, this Item is excellent as I mixed up a comment on another item I bought from another vendor, Please buy this, as I am Very happy, thxs Ed Val

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like picture, at ALL
customer_reviews.text: It was not an acceptable order. Very small and the items were not at all what I expected. I just didn't want the hassle of returning. It's still boxed and not planning to use.
customer_reviews.author: Knukels

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set with multifarious tools. Need more instruction to show how to use them
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Cheen

customer_reviews.title: Very compact, organized, and complete
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought this kit was because it came with the cream polish AND the wax polish, for a super shine. One great horsehair brush and a smaller one to get into the nooks and crannies works wonders. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made....excellent quality. Easy to pack in suitcases. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it and keep it in my office compact fit

customer_reviews.title: I Shines Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The paste is ok - set is very complete otherwise. I can shine shoes, mission accomplished.

customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with a very elegant leather container. It works great.Love it!

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped promptly and made of good quality material.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe care kit, super valved, come in everything you need in the bag,love it.

customer_reviews.title: garbage. The brushes are useless
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, garbage. The brushes are useless. This is a waste of money. Don't buy it.

customer_reviews.title: Very portable
customer_reviews.text: I volunteered to bootblack at an event in another part of the state, and this kit was just perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Gift to my college son. Right size for college ...
customer_reviews.text: Gift to my college son. Right size for college and a kid that routinely dresses up for music performances.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has all that is needed for cleaning your shoes while on travel. Even at home. Recomend it.

customer_reviews.title: It was present made great impression.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very timely and quality is very impressive. It was present made great impression.
customer_reviews.author: Sasabe

customer_reviews.title: ... has what you need to keep your shoes looking good while on the go
customer_reviews.text: It has what you need to keep your shoes looking good while on the go. It is a little difficult to get everything back in the case, fitting just right, so that you can clasp it shut. It is definitely a value for the money. But not big enough to be your regular shine kit.
customer_reviews.author: K. Page

customer_reviews.title: Its decent?
customer_reviews.text: This is a shoe care kit, I dont understand why Amazon is asking how it fits. Must just have a stupid algorithm that flags anything with the word "shoe" in it. This was purchased for someone else to use, they asked me to get it for them. It seems to be of good quality and they haven't complained.
customer_reviews.author: Kanoa K.

customer_reviews.title: you can put it in a book bag easily. It comes with two shoe polish in tubes
customer_reviews.text: The case is compact, you can put it in a book bag easily. It comes with two shoe polish in tubes,one black one neutral. And then one black and one neutral round canister polishes. Application brushes and polish cloths. I like the product and I believe it will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun F.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great portable kit. Arrived on time, well packaged. Ingenious placement of all items needed for shoe shining at home or travel
customer_reviews.author: John S. Marr MD

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE QUALITY. THE POLISH HAS A PETROLIUM SMELL THAT PERMEATED THE ROOM. NEVER BEEN SO DISAPPONTED BY AN ITEM PURCHASED ON AMAZON.

customer_reviews.title: I can't use this. I will be returning this ...

customer_reviews.title: it is not useful at all
customer_reviews.text: it is not useful at all. it is more like decorative shoe care kit. brush size is very small and it is not comfortable to hold it.

customer_reviews.title: Polish didn't shine
customer_reviews.text: Love the cases and the provided items, but the polish didn't seem to provide a shine for my shoes. I followed the instructions and tried different methods with no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sethjcsy Shoe Care Kit,12-Piece Travel Shoe Shine Brush kit, Black, Large
product_meta.description:
An Easy-to-carry Shoe shine kits great for Business Travelers, Military Services or Holiday traveling.

Take it with you wherever you go to keep that sharp look.

Pair up your shiny shoes with your perfect attire.

Great for Weddings and Special Events.

Package including:

Elegant, PU leather compact case*1 (24*7.5cm) 

Sponge Daubers*2

Shoe Polish Tin*4(Black,Transparent) 

Shoe brush*1 (12.5*4.1*3cm) 

Handle brush*1 (13.5*2.8cm) 

Metal shoe horn*1(10.5*3.8cm) 

Durable Shine Cloth*1 (42*13cm) 

Nail scissors*1

Package Weight: 400g

How to Shine and Care for Your Shoes 

1.Remove the laces from your shoes before starting to polish them. 

2.Clean the dirt and debris from your shoes. Debris can be embedded in leather if it is not cleaned off prior to polishing. For best results, 
it is recommended to clean your shoes with a cleaning wipe or damp rag and allow them to dry before applying polish. 

3. If your shoes are dry & cracked, apply a leather conditioner (not included). Just as your own skin can crack and become dry, so can leather. 
Apply the conditioner with a clean cotton cloth and allow the shoes to completely dry before proceeding to the next step.

4.Apply polish evenly to the entire body of the shoe. A thin layer of polish will do it, but you need to make sure that it is evenly applied to avoid spotting on the leather.
Let the polish dry before proceeding to the next step. Shoe polish should be applied with a clean cotton rag or the foam applicator.
Use the smaller brush to rub polish deep into the area between the heel & shoe uppers. 

5.Buff your shoes until they shine: First use the large brush; then use the buffing cloth in a brisk side to side motion for the final shine.





PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :9.7 x 3.1 x 2.9 inches; 1.05 Pounds
 * Department :Unisex-baby
 * Date First Available :December 16, 2016
 * ASIN :B01N2UHE0L

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #657,484 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #382 inShoe Care Kits & Sets 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.1 out of 5 stars120 ratings

How to Shine and Care for Your Shoes 

1.Remove the laces from your shoes before starting to polish them. 

2.Clean the dirt and debris from your shoes. Debris can be embedded in leather if it is not cleaned off prior to polishing. For best results, 
it is recommended to clean your shoes with a cleaning wipe or damp rag and allow them to dry before applying polish. 

3. If your shoes are dry & cracked, apply a leather conditioner (not included). Just as your own skin can crack and become dry, so can leather. 
Apply the conditioner with a clean cotton cloth and allow the shoes to completely dry before proceeding to the next step.

4.Apply polish evenly to the entire body of the shoe. A thin layer of polish will do it, but you need to make sure that it is evenly applied to avoid spotting on the leather.
Let the polish dry before proceeding to the next step. Shoe polish should be applied with a clean cotton rag or the foam applicator.
Use the smaller brush to rub polish deep into the area between the heel & shoe uppers. 

5.Buff your shoes until they shine: First use the large brush; then use the buffing cloth in a brisk side to side motion for the final shine.
feature_bullets: Sethjcsy includes nothing but the best quality accessories in its shoe shine kits, each piece designed and crafted to ensure maximum practicality, durability and function. What's more, they are all included in an elegant and stylish compact carrying case.
This shoe shine kit is small, lightweight, durable, and an exceptional value.
Help keep your boots and shoes look in brand new condition with this shoe care kit.
This shoe shine kit makes a great gift idea for men and women

LIFETIME WARRANTY & MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: At Sethjcsy, we have absolute faith in our premium shoe shine travel kit. After all, we use it ourselves daily! If, however, you do not find the product you receive to be up to your quality standards, we offer you a 100% money back guarantee. That's how confident we are in our shoe shine kits!
